answerText: Microtubule [10] This motor protein transports cargo along microtubules. Much research has gone into determining that its action is hand-over-hand rather than inchworm. Unlike dynein, this motor protein moves toward the + end of the microtubule.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Chicago A  | 24 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Nocodazole and Colchicine inhibit the formation of these structures. For 10 points: [10] Name these components of the cytoskeleton which form the spindle during mitosis. Their namesake organizing centers are composed of a pair of centrioles.
